metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8466 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Swift3 before 1.9 allows remote attackers to conduct replay attacks via anAuthorization request that lacks a Date header.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8466` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

swift-plugin-s3 - 1.7-5+deb8u1build0.14.04.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: swift-plugin-s3 package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.7-5+deb8u1build0.14.04.1~esm1').
